name: GlyphLang
description: An AI-first programming language designed specifically for AI generation rather than human writing. Replaces verbose keywords with concise symbols to optimize for AI token efficiency during long coding sessions.
community_quotes: Designed to be generated by AI rather than written by humans
Replaces verbose keywords with symbols for token efficiency
Addresses token limits during long AI coding sessions
607 points and 518 comments on Hacker News
